720522f-b.title: Manhattan: Hudson Street - Broome Street
720522f-b.text:
(1)
Hudson Street, west side, from Broome Street to Vandam, from
and including the east side from Watts Street to Dominick..
The east siue of Hudson Street, from Broome to Dominick, ha.
demolished to make a site for a new building.
February 12, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
4261-3 Hudson Street,West side between Spring and Watts Stree
looking Northwards.
October 2nd,1938.
P.L.Sperr,
No reproductions.
(3)Hudson Street,West side and Broome Street at the end of the
latter Street.
October 2nd,1938.
P.L.Sperr,
No Reproductions.
720522f-b.folder: Hudson Street & Broome Street, Manhattan, NY

717892f-a.title: Manhattan: Broome Street - Hudson Street
717892f-a.text:
Holland Tunnel Plaza and Broome Street, north side, from No. 582
Broome, east of Hudson, to Clark Street (Sixth .venue Exten-
sion).
October 11,1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
717892f-a.folder: Broome Street & Hudson Street, Manhattan, NY

720491f-a.title: Manhattan: Hudson Street - Broome Street
720491f-a.text:
Hudson Street, east side, from Broome Street to Vestry, showi
the new Holland Plaza Building in the block bounded by at
Hudson, Canal and Varick Streets.
November 6, 1929.
Brown Brothers.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

720508f-a.title: Manhattan: Hudson Street - Broome Street
720508f-a.text:
250 Hudson Street, at the N.E. corner of Broome Street, as seen through
clearance from Renwick Street.
July 26, 1935.
P. L. Sporr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
